content:
Hi everyone,

Here's our current Release 6.8. plan: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse-pm/issues/427

  • Start: Sprint 1, 2025-07-10
  • Community PR Last Call: 2025-08-28
  • Core PR Last Call: 2025-09-04
  • Code Freeze: 2025-09-11
  • Release Date: 2025-09-26

Dates are approximate.

Questions? Please let me or the team know!

Thanks,

--Ceilyn

The 6.8 release notes are ready for review: #11816

Feedback is welcome! :heart:
https://demo.dataverse.org and https://dataverse.harvard.edu have been upgraded to Dataverse 6.8.
